scripts.dev: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-storybook storybook
scripts.dev:storybook:web: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-storybook storybook:web
scripts.demo: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-showcase start
scripts.demo:ios: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-showcase ios
scripts.demo:android: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-showcase android
scripts.demo:web: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-showcase web
scripts.demo:export: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-showcase export:web
scripts.demo:publish: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-showcase publish
scripts.demo:publish:preview: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-showcase publish:preview
scripts.demo:build:full: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm build-storybook && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-showcase export:web
scripts.storybook:build: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-storybook build-storybook
scripts.release: pnpm run build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app publish --access public --no-git-checks
